meanings.definition: A group of things fastened or tied together.
meanings.sent1: She carried her bundles of books home from the library.
meanings.sent2: The farmer gathered the bundles of hay in the field.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel made a nest with the bundles of twigs.
meanings.sent4: His laughter was like a bundle of joy in the room.
meanings.sent5: The colorful bundles of balloons filled the sky during the parade.

meanings.sent1: There were bundles of people waiting in line for the concert.
meanings.sent2: The store offered bundles of discounts during the sale.
meanings.sent3: The chef used a bundle of spices to create the flavorful dish.
meanings.sent4: Her energy was a bundle of excitement at the party.
meanings.sent5: The garden was a bundle of colors in full bloom.
